sect1.title: Phonon-&phonon-version;

sect2.title: Installation of Phonon
sect2.para: Make sure that is compiled without the bundled Phonon library. This package provides a better implementation.
Install Phonon by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
mkdir build && cd build &&
cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=&qt4-dir; \ -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -DPHONON_INSTALL_QT_EXTENSIONS_INTO_SYSTEM_QT=TRUE \ -DDBUS_INTERFACES_INSTALL_DIR=/usr/share/dbus-1/interfaces \ .. && make

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release: This switch is used to apply higher level of compiler optimizations.
-DPHONON_INSTALL_QT_EXTENSIONS_INTO_SYSTEM_QT=TRUE: This option ensures that the plugins and mkspecs files get installed in the correct location.
-DDBUS_INTERFACES_INSTALL_DIR=/usr/share/dbus-1/interfaces: This option sets the correct installation path for a D-Bus interfaces file.
